oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Collection of Grand Army of the Republic (GAR) medals of A. P. Thompson
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Sgt. Absalom P. Thompson served in Co. E of the 1st Tenn. Inf. USA which mustered in at Camp Dick Robinson in Kentucky. There are 10 different items in this collection, including a cross, regimental pins, and medals from different GAR reunions.
